name: Sheep Herding Game 2
description:
For comparison purposes, this is the same sheep-herding game with the sheep seen in side view. It's a PK game: use your mind to herd the sheep. It might help to pretend to be a sheepdog in the scene. Or to talk to the sheep. Enjoy.

The sheep animations are from the Sheepy game, and don't worry: I made them, and the Sheepy license was non-exclusive. No copyright problems here.

Art: Affinity Designer and Aseprite
Coding: ct.js
